Items.Name: CopsBribe
Items.Text: Cops have arrived and asked for bribe

Items.Name: CantPayTheBills
Items.Text: Followers shares could not pay your bills

Items.Name: WonALawSuit
Items.Text: A follower has prosecuted you in the past and you won the judicial battle

Items.Name: FarReaches
Items.Text: Your word has reached the far reaches of the city
